Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Logan Square
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to sick customer on train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to sick customer on train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include: 

#56 Milwaukee

#76 Diversey

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
